Class Flower

java.lang.Object
Crop
Flower
Direct Known Subclasses:
Rose, Sunflower, Tulips
public abstract class Flower extends Crop
An abstract class representing Flower type Crops. Gets sold for more determined by a multiplier.

  • Constructor Details

    • Flower

      public Flower(String name, char id, int harvestTime, int water, int fertilizer, int seedCost, int sellPrice, double xp)
      Constructor of the class Flower. Parameters define the Flower's values.
      Parameters:
      name - the flower's name
      id - the flower's unique character id
      harvestTime - the amount of days needed for the flower to be harvested
      water - the amount of water needed by the flower
      fertilizer - the amount of fertilizer needed by the flower
      seedCost - the cost of planting the flower
      sellPrice - the selling price of the flower
      xp - the experience yield from harvesting the flower
